metadata.Title: CVE-2009-4016 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer underflow in the clean_string function in irc_string.c in (1) IRCD-hybrid 7.2.2 and 7.2.3, (2) ircd-ratbox before 2.2.9, and (3) oftc-hybrid before 1.6.8, when flatten_links is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a LINKS command.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-4016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ircd-hybrid - 1:7.2.2.dfsg.2-6ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ircd-hybrid package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:7.2.2.dfsg.2-6ubuntu3').
